title._content: [Tom D. Daly, Germany Schaefer, U.C. "Red" Faber on world tour (baseball)]  (LOC)

description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. [Tom D. Daly, Germany Schaefer, U.C. "Red" Faber on world tour (baseball)] [1914 March 9] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Original data provided by the Bain News Service on the negatives or caption cards: Tom Daly, Schaffer, J.C. Faber. Corrected title based on research by the Pictorial History Committee, Society for American Baseball Research, 2006. Date from similar Bain negative: LC-B2-3004-13. Photo shows basedball players including Urban Clarence "Red" Faber (1888-1976), an American pitcher for the Chicago White Sox and Herman A. "Germany" Schaefer (1876-1919). (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2010) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.15599 Call Number: LC-B2- 3004-13
